sentence.Network_en: It is only a hobby, not a life or death struggle.
sentence.Network_cn: 这只是一项爱好，不需要拼死拼活地努力。

sentence.Network_en: His secret hobby: performing magic tricks.
sentence.Network_cn: 他私底下有变戏法的嗜好。

sentence.Network_en: Find a hobby or interest which enthuses you.
sentence.Network_cn: 培养一个自己喜欢的爱好或兴趣。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English hobyn, hoby, from pet forms of the given name Robin. Originally in sense 2 (compare with dobbin), it later came to denote a toy horse or hobby horse, hence 'a pastime, something done for pleasure'
late Middle English: from Old French hobet, diminutive of hobe 'falcon'

entry.def: A hobby is an activity that you enjoy doing in your spare time.

example.ex: My hobbies are letter writing, football, music, photography, and tennis.
example.tran: 我的业余爱好是写信、踢足球、听音乐、玩摄影和打网球。

means.word_mean: 2. a child's plaything consisting of an imitation horse mounted on rockers; the child straddles it and pretends to ride
3. small Old World falcon formerly trained and flown at small birds

auth_sentence.content: Because I make and sell them as a hobby.
auth_sentence.res_content: Because I make and sell them as a hobby.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Because I make and sell them as a hobby.

auth_sentence.content: Then I guess not collecting stamps is a hobby.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then I guess not collecting stamps is a hobby.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then I guess not collecting stamps is a hobby.

auth_sentence.content: His onetime hobby became his sole source of income.
auth_sentence.res_content: His onetime hobby became his sole source of income.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His onetime hobby became his sole source of income.

Sentence.sentence: However, having free time to relax and pursue hobbies is important.
When I was working full-time as a salesman for a big company, I seldom had time to enjoy my hobby.

sentences.en: He entered into politics as a hobby.
sentences.cn: 他参加政治活动是作为一种业余爱好。

jushi.english: He didn't know what to do when he retired from work as he had no hobbies.
jushi.chinese: 他由于没有任何业余爱好,故退休之后就不知干些什么才好。
音乐是他的主要业余爱好。

jushi.english: Gardening is one of his hobbies.
jushi.chinese: 园艺是他的业余爱好之一。
